body.description: Product Description This peptide-rich cream with Jeju Orchid helps to hydrates, visibly smooth, and support the look of firmness. Infused with Jeju orchid and naturally-derived hyaluronic acid, this nourishing rich cream helps address early visible signs of aging for a youthful glow.Innisfree offers innovative beauty solutions powered by the finest natural ingredients responsibly sourced from Korea’s pristine Jeju Island. Thanks to its volcanic origins, this fertile oasis has a unique ecosystem with unparalleled resources to nurture beautiful skin. Our proprietary extraction methods preserve the purity and potency of these wholesome ingredients from plant to bottle, offering advanced formulas that safely address all skin concerns without the use of harmful chemicals and preservatives. With the wonders of nature at the heart of innisfree, we take care to preserve and protect the environment in all that we do.How To Use:Use at the last step of your skincare routine. Apply all over face and neck AM and PM. Press to help absorption.Skin Types & Concerns:This nourishing cream is perfect for oily, combination, normal, and dry skin types and helps address visible signs of early aging while delivering lightweight hydration.Jeju Ingredient Story:Innisfree Orchidelixir 2.0™, a potent antioxidant from the Jeju Orchid, Niacinamide, and Hyaluronic Acid, helps to visibly brighten, hydrate and address early visible signs of aging. We extract the active ingredients from every part of the Jeju Orchid, from root to petal, to create our Orchidelixir 2.0™. This potent complex delivers antioxidants similar to those found in Vitamin C to help address the early visible signs of aging.Formulated Without:Animal-Originated Ingredients, Mineral Oil, Polyacrylamides, Imidazolidinyl urea, Triethanolamine, Synthetic Colorants, Parabens. Brand Story Innisfree offers innovative, accessible, effective skincare beauty solutions powered by responsibly sourced natural ingredients from Jeju Island, South Korea. We treat skin without the use of harmful chemicals and preservatives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasting hydration and plumping - never buying another eye cream again!
reviews.reviewText: I'll apply this at night, and it is so hydrating that in the morning, I can tap around my eye area and still feel the cream on it. Every other eye cream I've tried (such as Cerave) dries quickly and has no lasting effect on my eyes. It keeps my eyes so supple and hydrated. It helps with the puffiness and instantly brightens my under eyes as it has a slight shimmer/highlighter effect to it. My eyes feel and look so hydrated all day. ALSO smells so good! The scent is not overpowering - it's like a light orchid perfume and I can smell it on me at times throughout the day. This is my first Innisfree product, and I will be definitely checking out the rest of them, especially their orchid products. Please never change the formula! Will be repurchasing! Finally found my holy grail eye cream!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am only purchasing this eye cream from now until forever! It feels like silk! So good for moisturizing. And it lasts all day. My skin fells so young again. In love with the brand as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but large!
reviews.reviewText: I really love the product itself. It isn’t a miracle product by any means, but it makes my under eyes feel plump, firm, and dewy. Application is smooth and satisfying, and the floral scent is pleasant yet not too strong. My issue is with the size of the product. In about two months, I’ve barely made a dent in it. With a PAO (period after opening) of 12 months, I really doubt I’ll finish the pot within a year. I’d love to see this product sold in smaller sizes so it can be used completely before the PAO is up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is one of my favorite! I was first given it as a gift and bought it myself when it ran out! It smells great and my eye area feels good and soft when I apply it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love it. This is my number one moisturizer in winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smooth facial mosisturizer
reviews.reviewText: it makes your skin like baby. very smooth and long lasting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This didn't really do anything for me.
reviews.reviewText: I feel like eye creams are sort of a scam. It didn't do anything for my after religiously wearing it until it was empty. I still have darkness under my eyes and it doesn't really reduce puffiness for me. 30 for an eye cream is also quite steep price wise.However, it smelled amazing so there's that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s Thick and Hydrating
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is one of a kind. I’m someone that is looking for a thick, heavy cream that feels moisturizing for a long period of time. I found it in this cream! Your skin will thank you after one night of this hydration. The scent is mild and the cream is not greasy feeling. It is too heavy to wear under makeup, but perfect for nighttime wear.

reviews.reviewTitle: A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: I use this moisturizer primarily as an eye cream, and find a little can go a long way, especially if you have oily and sensitive skin like myself.
Great product and works great on lips as well!
